summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Scio Verum Corporation for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It details account balances, transactions including withdrawals and deposits, and service charges, indicating the financial activity of the corporation during this period.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account held by Scio Verum Corporation.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $19,057.33 and an ending balance of $38,541.05 for the statement period.
There were 3 checks and 5 withdrawals totaling $20,530.65 during the period.
Deposits during the period amounted to $40,014.37.
The standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The document includes transactions related to Paychex and an online transfer.
